Built with SvelteKit and hosted on GitHub Pages.

A small client side javascript application to manage measured times and splits of swimmers. Supports managing swimmers, sharing database via export and import, displaying PBs and data import from LENEX file format.

Sharing of data is possible with the import and export functionality.

The whole app is built using Claude Code in a few evenings. For me, it was the perfect learning project on how to best work with an AI assistant.

A small client side javascript application to manage measured times and splits of swimmers. Supports managing swimmers, sharing database via export and import, displaying PBs and data import from LENEX file format.

Hi, my name is Tim Bachmann! I'm a software engineer at Coop Genossenschaft, swimmer and swim coach.

I am passionate about all things web development, swimming, personal knowledge management and much more. If you liked this or any of my posts, feel free to follow me.
